# py-tx-queue

> Atomic, transaction-safe, robust job queueing for Python applications. Backed by PostgreSQL and built to scale.

## Inspiration

- [River for Go](https://riverqueue.com/)
- [Oban for Elixir](https://getoban.pro/)
